com.model.layout

Class FloorLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.model.layout.FloorLayout

  • public class FloorLayout
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the layout of the floor, including all of the positions of the rooms. Also tracks the position of the player for ease of use.
    Author:
    Christopher

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Generates a new floor layout of the designated floor number.

      Generates a new floor layout of the designated floor number.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FloorLayout

        public FloorLayout(int floorNumber)
        Generates a new floor layout of the designated floor number.
        Parameters:
        floorNumber - the floor number to be created. Floor width and height will be set to this value plus three.

      • FloorLayout

        public FloorLayout(int floorNumber,
                   java.awt.Dimension playerLocation)
        Generates a new floor layout of the designated floor number.
        Parameters:
        floorNumber - the floor number to be created. Floor width and height will be set to this value plus three.
        playerLocation - the initial location of the player.

      • FloorLayout

        public FloorLayout(int floorNumber,
                   java.awt.Dimension playerLocation,
                   GUI view)
        Generates a new floor layout of the designated floor number.
        Parameters:
        floorNumber - the floor number to be created. Floor width and height will be set to this value plus three.
        playerLocation - the initial location of the player.
        view - view to be notified

        Returns true if there is a room in the selected direction next to the room currently inhabited by the player, or otherwise false.

        Returns:
        whether a room exists.

      • roomDiscovered

        public boolean roomDiscovered(Direction dir,
                              java.awt.Dimension location)
        Returns true if the room in the specified direction next to the room at the passed location both exists and has been discovered, else false.
        Parameters:
        dir - direction to be travelled.
        location - location to be checked.
        Returns:
        whether the specified room exists and has been discovered.

        Parameters:

        location - location to be checked.
        Returns:
        whether the specified room exists and has been entered.

        Returns:

      • offsetLocation

        public java.awt.Dimension offsetLocation(java.awt.Dimension location,
                                         java.awt.Dimension offset)
        Returns the passed location offset by the passed offset, after checking that the resultant location is within the bounds of this floor. If not, throws an InvalidParameterException.
        Parameters:
        location - location to be offset.
        offset - amount to offset location by.
        Returns:
        offset location.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidParameterException - if combined location is not within the floor bounds.

      • offsetLocation

        public java.awt.Dimension offsetLocation(java.awt.Dimension location,
                                         java.awt.Dimension offset,
                                         int floorWidth,
                                         int floorHeight)
        Returns the passed location offset by the passed offset, after checking that the resultant location is within the bounds given. If not, throws an InvalidParameterException.
        Parameters:
        location - location to be offset.
        offset - amount to offset location by.
        floorWidth - maximum value for resultant location width.
        floorHeight - maximum value for resultant location height.
        Returns:
        offset location.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidParameterException - if combined location is not within the given bounds.

      • movePlayer

        public boolean movePlayer(Direction dir)
        Attempts to move the player in the specified direction. Will return false if this would leave the player out of bounds, or in a gap, or otherwise will return true.
        Parameters:
        dir - direction to move the player.
        Returns:
        true if the room exists, else false.

      • setPlayerLocation

        public boolean setPlayerLocation(java.awt.Dimension location)
        Attempts to set the player's location to the specified location. Will return false if the location is not a room on the floor, otherwise will return true and move the player accordingly.
        Parameters:
        location - location for player to be moved to.
        Returns:
        true if the player could be moved otherwise false.

      • getRoom

        public Room getRoom()
        Returns:
        the room at the player's current location.

      • getRoom

        public Room getRoom(int x,
                    int y)
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the desired room
        y - y coordinate of the desired room
        Returns:
        the room at the specified location, or null no room is found.

      • getRoom

        public Room getRoom(java.awt.Dimension location)
        Parameters:
        location - location of the desired room.
        Returns:
        the room at the specified location, or null no room is found.

      • getPlayerLocation

        public java.awt.Dimension getPlayerLocation()
